text: Ángel Bello was an Argentine archer from Spain. Bello competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics.Angel BELLO He was born on 9 January 1951 and died on 13 June 2013.Ángel Bello == References == Category:1951 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Argentine archers Category:Olympians for Argentina
title: Ángel Bello
